description: This file implements backend APIs for device control and management functions in a Cisco-based SDK or firmware environment. It includes functions for initialization, retrieving and setting network configurations, factory reset, reboot processes, Wi-Fi reboot, and other device management features.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcInit(ANSC_HANDLE hDml,PANSC_HANDLE phContext)
methods.description: Initializes device control module, reads a config for zero-configuration, and starts avahi services if enabled.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetMultiHomedHSDFlag(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,char * pValue,ULONG * pulSize)
methods.description: Retrieves the multi-homed HSD flag, returning a localized string.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetMultiHomedUIPageControl(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,char * pValue,ULONG * pulSize)
methods.description: Gets the multi-homed UI page control string.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetMultiHomedMode(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,char * pValue,ULONG * pulSize)
methods.description: Gets the multi-homed mode, currently a stub.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetMultiHomedBridgingStatus(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,char * pValue,ULONG * pulSize)
methods.description: Gets the bridging status, currently a stub.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetMultiHomedMode
methods.description: Sets the multi-homed mode, currently a stub.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetMultiHomedHSDFlag
methods.description: Sets the multi-homed HSD flag, currently a stub.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetMultiHomedUIPageControl
methods.description: Sets the multi-homed UI page control, currently a stub.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetWanAddressMode(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,COSA_DML_WanAddrMode * pMode)
methods.description: Reads the WAN IP configuration mode (DHCP/static) from Utopia.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetWanStaticIPAddress(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,ULONG * ipAddr)
methods.description: Reads the WAN static IP address from Utopia.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetReInitCmMac
methods.description: Re-initializes the cable modem MAC address.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetWanStaticSubnetMask(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,ULONG * ipAddr)
methods.description: Reads the WAN subnet mask from Utopia.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetWanStaticGatewayIP(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,ULONG * ipAddr)
methods.description: Reads the WAN default gateway IP from Utopia.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetWanSecondIPAddr(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,ULONG * ipAddr)
methods.description: Gets the second WAN IP address, stub implementation.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetWanSecondIPRipAdvertised(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,BOOLEAN * pFlag)
methods.description: Gets the RIP advertisement flag for secondary IP, stub.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetWanBackupDefaultGateway(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,ULONG * ipAddr)
methods.description: Gets backup default gateway, stub.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetWanNameServer(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,ULONG * ipAddr,int nameServerNo)
methods.description: Gets the configured WAN name server IP.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetWanHostName(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,char * pHostName)
methods.description: Reads the hostname from /etc/hostname.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetWanDomainName(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,char * pDomainName)
methods.description: Reads domain name from /etc/resolv.conf.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetWanStaticDomainName(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,char * pStaticDomainName)
methods.description: Gets the static WAN domain name from Utopia.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetWanAddressMode
methods.description: Sets WAN address mode (DHCP/static) in Utopia.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetWanStaticIPAddress
methods.description: Sets the static IP address in Utopia.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetWanStaticSubnetMask
methods.description: Sets the subnet mask.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetWanStaticGatewayIP
methods.description: Sets the gateway IP.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetWanSecondIPAddr
methods.description: Sets the second WAN IP address, stub.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetWanSecondIPRipAdvertised
methods.description: Sets RIP advertisement flag, stub.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetWanBackupDefaultGateway
methods.description: Sets backup gateway, stub.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetWanNameServer
methods.description: Sets the name server IP in Utopia and updates resolv.conf.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcSetHostName(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,char * pValue)
methods.description: Sets hostname, updates via script, and triggers wan restart if changed.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcSetDomainName(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,char * pValue)
methods.description: Sets domain name, updates via script.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetResetDefaultEnable(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,BOOLEAN * pFlag)
methods.description: Stub returning FALSE.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetSNMPEnable(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,char * pValue)
methods.description: Retrieves SNMP enable status via platform HAL.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetSNMPEnable
methods.description: Sets SNMP enable status via platform HAL.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetRebootDevice(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,char * pValue)
methods.description: Stub, returns empty string.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetFactoryReset(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,char * pValue)
methods.description: Stub, returns empty string.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetUserChangedFlags(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,char * pValue)
methods.description: Stub, returns '0'.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetDeviceConfigStatus(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,char * pValue)
methods.description: Queries device config status via platform HAL.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetDeviceConfigIgnore(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,char * pValue)
methods.description: Returns a fixed string indicating no config needed.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcSetDeviceConfigIgnore(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,char * pValue)
methods.description: Stub.

methods.name: void * CosaDmlDcRebootWifi(ANSC_HANDLE hContext)
methods.description: Reboots Wi-Fi radios via D-Bus.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcResetBr0(char * ip,char * sub)
methods.description: Configures and resets bridge with given IP and subnet.

methods.name: void * CosaDmlDcRestartRouter(void * arg)
methods.description: Restarts LAN, triggers router reboot process.

methods.name: restoreAllDBs
methods.description: Removes configs and data for factory reset, handles platform-specific cleanups.

methods.name: backuplogs
methods.description: Backups logs, waits for WiFi reset thread if provided.

methods.name: resetWiFi
methods.description: Restores WiFi to factory defaults, updates system parameters, triggers reboot.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcSetFactoryReset(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,char * pValue)
methods.description: Sets factory reset based on parameter string, includes LED indication, platform-specific behaviors, and resets various subsystems.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetUserChangedFlags
methods.description: Stub function to set user changed flags, always returns success.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetResetDefaultEnable
methods.description: Stub function to set default reset enable flag, always returns success.

methods.name: _CosaDmlDcStartZeroConfig
methods.description: Starts Avahi zero-configuration daemons by creating configuration files and executing start commands.

methods.name: _CosaDmlDcStopZeroConfig
methods.description: Stops Avahi daemons by executing stop commands.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetEnableStaticNameServer(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,BOOLEAN * pFlag)
methods.description: Retrieves the static nameserver enable status from Utopia context.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcSetEnableStaticNameServer(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,BOOLEAN bFlag)
methods.description: Sets the static nameserver enable status in Utopia, updates resolv.conf, and restarts WAN if disabled.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetReleaseWan(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,BOOLEAN * pFlag)
methods.description: Stub returning success status.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetReleaseWan
methods.description: Releases the DHCP client lease by executing a system command.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetRenewWan(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,BOOLEAN * pFlag)
methods.description: Stub returning success status.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetRenewWan
methods.description: Renews the WAN DHCP lease by executing system commands and polling for status.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetEnableZeroConfig(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,BOOLEAN * pFlag)
methods.description: Returns the current ZeroConfig enable flag.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcSetEnableZeroConfig(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,BOOLEAN bFlag)
methods.description: Sets the ZeroConfig flag, updates Utopia context, and starts or stops zero config services accordingly.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetDeviceMode(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,ULONG * pValue)
methods.description: Retrieves the device mode (router or erouter) from Utopia.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcSetDeviceMode(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,ULONG value)
methods.description: Sets the device mode in sysctl and triggers reboot if needed.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetIGMPProxyEnable(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,BOOLEAN * pFlag)
methods.description: Checks whether igmpproxy process is running.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcSetIGMPProxyEnable(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,BOOLEAN pFlag)
methods.description: Enables or disables igmpproxy process.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetDNSProxyEnable(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,BOOLEAN * pFlag)
methods.description: Checks whether dnsproxy process is running.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcSetDNSProxyEnable(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,BOOLEAN pFlag)
methods.description: Enables or disables dnsproxy process.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetTelnetEnable(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,BOOLEAN * pFlag)
methods.description: Retrieves telnet enable flag from syscfg and platform HAL.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetSSHEnable(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,BOOLEAN * pFlag)
methods.description: Retrieves SSH enable flag from syscfg and platform HAL.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetHNAPEnable(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,BOOLEAN * pFlag)
methods.description: Returns TRUE by default, stub function.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetTelnetEnable
methods.description: Enables or disables telnet access, updates syscfg and triggers firewall restart.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetSSHEnable
methods.description: Enables or disables SSH access, updates syscfg and triggers firewall restart.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcSetHNAPEnable(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,BOOLEAN flag)
methods.description: Stub function, always returns success.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetHTTPEnable(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,BOOLEAN * pValue)
methods.description: Returns TRUE; stub.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetHTTPSEnable(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,BOOLEAN * pValue)
methods.description: Returns TRUE; stub.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetHTTPPort(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,ULONG * pValue)
methods.description: Retrieves HTTP port from web server configuration.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetHTTPSPort(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,ULONG * pValue)
methods.description: Retrieves HTTPS port from web server configuration.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetReinitMacThreshold
methods.description: Sets reinit MAC threshold value in syscfg or platform-specific API.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetReinitMacThreshold(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,ULONG * pValue)
methods.description: Retrieves reinit MAC threshold from syscfg or platform.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetWebServer
methods.description: Configures web server ports and restarts web server.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetMsoRemoteMgmtEnable(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,BOOLEAN * pFlag)
methods.description: Gets MSO remote management enable flag from Utopia.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetMsoRemoteMgmtEnable
methods.description: Sets MSO remote management flag in Utopia.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetCusadminRemoteMgmtEnable(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,BOOLEAN * pFlag)
methods.description: Gets cusadmin remote management enable flag from Utopia.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcSetCusadminRemoteMgmtEnable(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,BOOLEAN pFlag)
methods.description: Sets cusadmin remote management flag in Utopia.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetHSEthernetPortEnable(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,BOOLEAN * pFlagcpv)
methods.description: Gets the status of Home Security Ethernet port via PSM.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcSetHSEthernetPortEnable(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,BOOLEAN pFlag)
methods.description: Enables or disables Home Security Ethernet port via PSM and PSM interfaces.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetGuestPassword(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,char * pValue)
methods.description: Retrieves the guest password from Utopia.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcSetGuestPassword(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,char * pValue)
methods.description: Sets guest password, updates Utopia, creates a allow list file, and restarts firewall.

methods.name: ULONG CosaDmlDcGetNoOfGuests()
methods.description: Retrieves the number of guest entries from Utopia.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetNoOfGuests
methods.description: Sets the number of guest entries in Utopia.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetParConPassword(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,char * pValue)
methods.description: Retrieves parental control password from Utopia.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetParConPassword
methods.description: Sets parental control password, creates allow list, and restarts firewall.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetParConQuestion(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,char * pValue)
methods.description: Retrieves parental control question from Utopia.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetParConQuestion
methods.description: Sets parental control question in Utopia.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetParConAnswer(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,char * pValue)
methods.description: Gets parental control answer from Utopia.

methods.name: CosaDmlDcSetParConAnswer
methods.description: Sets parental control answer, updates Utopia.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetDefaultParConPassword(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,char * pValue)
methods.description: Retrieves default parental control password from Utopia.

methods.name: CosaDmlGetMocaHardwareStatus
methods.description: Returns MoCA hardware status (available or not).

methods.name: CosaDmlLanMngm_GetNumberOfEntries
methods.description: Gets the count of managed LAN settings from Utopia.

methods.name: CosaDmlLanMngm_GetEntryByIndex
methods.description: Retrieves LAN management configuration by index from Utopia.

methods.name: CosaDmlLanMngm_SetValues
methods.description: Sets LAN management instance number and alias in Utopia.

methods.name: CosaDmlLanMngm_AddEntry
methods.description: Stub, always returns failure.

methods.name: CosaDmlLanMngm_DelEntry
methods.description: Stub, always returns failure.

methods.name: CosaDmlLanMngm_GetConf
methods.description: Retrieves LAN management configuration by instance, from Utopia.

methods.name: bridge_mode_wifi_notifier_thread
methods.description: Thread function to apply bridge mode WiFi settings via Ccsp base interface, adjusting radio and SSID enabling, and configuring network modes. Also handles mesh network notifications and updates.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcGetErouterEnabled(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,BOOLEAN * pFlag)
methods.description: Retrieves the current Erouter enabled state from syscfg.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlDcSetErouterEnabled(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,BOOLEAN bFlag)
methods.description: Configures the Erouter enabled state and applies bridge mode accordingly.

methods.name: is_mesh_enabled
methods.description: Checks syscfg for mesh_enable flag to determine if mesh is enabled.

methods.name: set_mesh_disabled
methods.description: Sets mesh enable flag to false via CCSP base interface and handles related process.

methods.name: void CosaDmlDcSaveWiFiHealthStatusintoNVRAM(void)
methods.description: Saves WiFi health status into NVRAM, handles special box types, and performs backup operations.

methods.name: int CheckAndGetDevicePropertiesEntry(char * pOutput,int size,char * sDevicePropContent)
methods.description: Reads device properties from file and retrieves specified entries.

methods.name: IsPortInUse
methods.description: Checks if a given port is currently in use by inspecting /proc/net/tcp and /proc/net/tcp6.
